column4: Anyone know how to require GPG to ask for a password before encryption?
Right now if I encrypt to a public key, it will do so without asking the password of my private key.
Encryption doesn't require any passphrases, because it doesn't use your private key. If you told it to encrypt and sign, it would ask for it.
(well, assuming you didn't have passphrase caching turned on, but that's a whole 'nother thing ;)
